channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Education Department withdraws from plan to address discipline disparities for Native students
item.description: The Education Department has withdrawn from an agreement to address disparities in discipline for Native American students at a South Dakota school system, saying it was wrongly rooted in efforts to promote diversity, equity and inclusion.

item.title: Trump’s new energy order puts states’ climate laws in the crosshairs of the Department of Justice
This federal rule helped clear air over America’s most beloved parks. Trump’s EPA wants to kill it
